name: ns1

scripts.create-browser-script: browserify src/index.js -s NS1API -o dist/ns1api_client.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.doc: rm -rf docs/ && jsdoc src/**.js README.md -d docs
scripts.gh-pages: npm run doc && git branch -D gh-pages; git checkout --orphan gh-pages && find . -maxdepth 1 ! -name 'docs' ! -name '.*' | xargs rm -rf && mv docs/* . && git add --all . && git commit -am 'documentation' && git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout develop
